item.title: Cache downloading problem
item.dc:creator: @squal707 squal707
item.description:
@squal707 wrote:

ok my cache downloads and extracts perfect its just where it extracts that gets me…

ok i have this in my signlink.java
String s = “”;
String s1 = “C:/.pures_file_store/”;
File file = new File(s1 + s);
if(file.exists() || file.mkdir())
return s1 + s + “/”;
}

this is what i have in my client.java

   public Class44 method67(int i, String s, String s1, int j, byte byte0, int k)
    {
        byte abyte0[] = null;
        int l = 5;
        try
        {
            if(aClass14Array970[0] != null)
            {
                abyte0 = aClass14Array970[0].method233(true, i);
            }
            if(abyte0 == null)
            {
                System.out.println("Downloading the 15mb cache file just once, please be patient.");
                JFrame jframe = new JFrame("File downloading...");
                jframe.addWindowListener(new WindowAdapter() {



                    public void windowClosing(WindowEvent windowevent)
                    {
                    }

            

                });
                JLabel jlabel = new JLabel("The file is downloading and will take a while! Please be patient!");
                jlabel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(360, 100));
                jframe.getContentPane().add(jlabel, "Center");
                jframe.pack();
                jframe.setVisible(true);
                new Update("http://freewebs.com/icescapeclient/pures_file_store.zip", "cache.zip", signlink.findcachedir(), true, true);
                if(aClass14Array970[0] != null)
                {
                    abyte0 = aClass14Array970[0].method233(true, i);
                }
            }

when i run the client it makes a new folder
C:.pures_file_store

but then when it extracts it makes a new folder inside that folder.
C:.pures_file_store.pures_file_store

and thats where all the files go.

how do i make it so it downloads and extracts in C:.pures_file_store
